abstract: The return of “Desperate Housewives” lifted ABC to No. 1 in the ratings on Sunday as 16 million viewers tuned in at 9 p.m. for the first new episode of the series since early January, according to Nielsen’s estimates. Despite delivering the series’ lowest ratings to date among adults 18 to 49, “Desperate Housewives” still easily led the night in that demographic.
lead_paragraph: The return of “Desperate Housewives” lifted ABC to No. 1 in the ratings on Sunday as 16 million viewers tuned in at 9 p.m. for the first new episode of the series since early January, according to Nielsen’s estimates. Despite delivering the series’ lowest ratings to date among adults 18 to 49, “Desperate Housewives” still easily led the night in that demographic.
